sentences.sContent: She was euchred out of first place in the competition.
sentences.sContent_eng: She was euchred out of first place in the competition.
sentences.sCn: 她被打败而没获比赛第一名。

sentences.sContent: Let me congratulate you on your winning first place in the 100 metre dash.
sentences.sContent_eng: Let me congratulate you on your winning first place in the 100 metre dash.
sentences.sCn: 祝贺你获得百米赛跑第一名。
